steps.step: ekam: inhale, lift the arms up.
dve: exhale, fold forward.
trini: inhale, head up only.
catvari: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
panca: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sat: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump forward, head up.
astau: exhale, fold forward.
nava: inhale, lift the arms up.
ekam: inhale, lift the arms up and bend knees to utkatasana
dve: exhale, fold forward.
trini: inhale, head up.
catvari: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
panca: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sat: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, right foot forward to Warrior 1.
astau: exhale, hands down, step back to chaturanga.
nava: inhale, push up to upward dog.
dasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
ekadasa: inhale, left foot forward to Warrior 1.
dvadasa: exhale, hands down, step back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
pancadasa: inhale, jump forward, head up.
sodasa: exhale, fold forward.
saptadasa: inhale, hands up, bent knees, utkatasana.
Spread the feet half a foot apart.
ekam: inhale, catch the big toes, head up.
dve: exhale, take the head between the legs.
trini: inhale, lift the head up.
ekam: inhale, place the palms under the feet, head up.
dve: exhale, take the head between the legs.
trini: inhale, head up,
ekam: inhale, jump to the right side, legs three feet apart, arms out.
dve: exhale, pivot right to catch the right big toe, look up
trini: inhale, come up.
catvari: exhale, pivot left to catch the left big toe, look up
panca: inhale, come up, arms out
dve: exhale, twist the body to the right side, place the left hand next to the right foot.
trini: inhale, come up.
catvari: exhale, twist the body to the left side. Place the right hand next to the left foot.
panca: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, jump to the right side with the legs five feet apart and arms out.
dve: exhale, bend the right knee, place the right hand outside the right foot, reach the left arm over the head.
trini: inhale, come up.
catvari: exhale, bend the left knee, place the left hand outside the left foot, reach the right arm over the head.
panca: inhale, come up.
dve: exhale, bend the right knee, twist the body, and place the left hand outside the right foot.
trini: inhale, come up.
catvari: exhale, bend the left knee, twist the body, and place the right hand outside the left foot.
panca: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, jump to the right side, place the hands on the waist.
dve: exhale, place the hands on the floor between the feet. Inhale and lift the head up.
trini: exhale, place the head on the floor.
catvari: inhale, lift the head only, keep the hands on the floor.
panca: inhale, hands on waist, come up.
ekam: inhale, spread the arms out to the side.
dve: exhale, place the hands on the waist.
trini: exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet.
catvari: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, spread the arms out to the side.
dve: exhale, clasp hands behind the back.
trini: exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet and reach the hands toward the floor.
catvari: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, place the hands on the waist.
dve: exhale, catch the big toes. Inhale, lift the head.
trini: exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet.
catvari: inhale, lift the head only.
panca: inhale, hands to waist, come up.
ekam: inhale, jump to the right side with the feet three feet apart, palms together behind back
dve: exhale, bend forward front leg straight.
trini: inhale, come up. Turn to the left side.
catvari: exhale, bend forward, leg straight.
panca: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, catch the right big toe with the right hand, keep both legs straight.
dve: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
trini: inhale, head up.
catvari: exhale, take the leg to the right side, look to the left
panca: inhale, bring the leg back to the front.
sat: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sapta: inhale, lift the head. Place both hands on the waist.
astau: inhale, catch the left big toe with the left hand, keep both legs straight.
nava: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
dasa: inhale, head up.
ekadasa: exhale, take the leg to the left side, look to the right
dvadasa: inhale, bring the leg to the front.
trayodasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
caturdasa: inhale, lift the head. Place the hands on the waist.
ekam: inhale, take the right leg into half padmasana, bind.
dve: exhale, bend forward, place the left hand next to the left foot.
trini: inhale, head up only.
catvari: inhale, come up.
panca: exhale, release the right leg.
sat: inhale, take the left leg into half padmasana, bind.
sapta: exhale, bend forward, place the right hand next to the right foot.
Breath five times.
astau: inhale, head up only.
nava: inhale, come up.
ekam: inhale, hands up.
dve: exhale, fold forward.
trini: inhale, head up
catvari: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
panca: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sat: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump the feet forward to the hands, bend the legs, take the arms up to utkatasana
astau: inhale, hands down, lift up.
nava: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
ekadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, step the right leg forward and take the arms up to Virabhadrasana 1
astau: exhale, turn to the left side.
nava: exhale, spread the arms to the side (Virabhadrasana 2).
dasa: exhale, turn to the right side.
ekadasa: inhale, place both hands down beside the front foot, lift the legs up.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale. Jump through to seated, straighten the legs, keep the hands next to the hips, tuck the chin.
astau: inhale, catch the big toes and lift the head up.
nava: exhale, touch the head or chin to the knees.
dasa: inhale, head up.
astau: inhale, lock the hands around the feet, lift the head up.
nava: exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
dasa: inhale, head up.
ekadasa: inhale, lift.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, straighten the legs.
astau: inhale, lift the hips up.
nava: exhale, come down.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, right leg into half padmasana, bind. Left hand to left foot.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated, left leg into half padmasana, bind. Right hand to right foot.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through with right leg folded back. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through with left leg folded back. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: jump through to seated, fold the right leg to the side. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated, fold the left leg to the side. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, sit on right heel. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated, sit on left heel. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, right foot in with the heel up. Catch the left foot, head up.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated, left foot in with the heel up. Catch the right foot, head up.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, bend the right knee, bend forward, and bind.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated, bend the left knee, bend forward, and bind.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Take the left leg into half padmasana, bend the right knee, bend forward, and bind.
astau: exhale, touch the nose or chin to the floor.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump through to seated. Take the right leg into half padmasana, bend the left knee, bend forward, and bind.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the nose or chin to the floor.
sodasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
saptadasa: inhale, lift up with crossed legs.
astadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
ekonavimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Bend the right knee, twist right, and bind.
astau: inhale, lift.
nava: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
ekadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
dvadasa: inhale, jump through to seated. Bend the left knee, twist left, and bind.
trayodasa: inhale, lift.
caturdasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
pancadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Take the left leg into half padmasana, twist right, and bind.
astau: inhale, lift.
nava: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
ekadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
dvadasa: inhale, jump through to seated. Take the right leg into half padmasana, twist left, and bind.
trayodasa: inhale, lift.
caturdasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
pancadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
astau: inhale, lift. Exhale, lower down.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
astau: inhale, lift. Exhale, lower down.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
astau: inhale, lift. Exhale, lower down.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
astau: inhale, lift. Exhale, lower down.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
astau: inhale, lift. Exhale, lower down.
nava: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
ekadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump and wrap the legs around the arms. Lock the feet in front of you with the right on top of the left.
astau: exhale, place the head or chin on the floor.
nava: inhale, lift the head or chin up off the floor.
dasa: inhale, take bakasana.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump and place the legs around the arms. Go down and straighten the arms and legs.
astau: exhale, take the arms behind the back and lock the hands.
nava: inhale, cross the feet, and take them behind the head. The right leg should be on top of the left.
dasa: inhale, lift up.
ekadasa: inhale, take the legs to bakasana position.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated.
astau: inhale, take padmasana position, thread the arms through the legs, place the hands over the ears.
nava: exhale, roll down onto the back.
nava: exhale, roll down onto the back.
nava: exhale, roll down onto the back.
nava: exhale, roll down onto the back.
nava: exhale, roll down onto the back.
nava: inhale, lift up and balance.
dasa: inhale, lift up in padmasana or with crossed legs.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Pull your heels in.
astau: exhale, touch the chin on the floor.
nava: inhale, sit up.
dasa: exhale, touch the head to the toes.
ekadasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
dvadasa: inhale, lift.
trayodasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
caturdasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
pancadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated. Spread the legs, catch the heels with the hands, and lift the head up.
astau: exhale, touch the chin to the floor.
nava: inhale, lift the head up only.
dasa: inhale, lift both of the legs up and balance.
ekadasa: inhale, lift.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: inhale, take both legs back over the head, spread the legs, and catch the big toes.
nava: inhale, roll up while holding the toes.
dasa: inhale, lift the head up only.
ekadasa: inhale, lift.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: inhale, catch the right big toe with the right hand while keeping both legs straight.
nava: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
dasa: inhale, lower the head only.
ekadasa: exhale, take the right leg to the right side, look to the left.
dvadasa: inhale, bring the right leg back to the center.
trayodasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
caturdasa: inhale, lower the head only.
pancadasa: exhale, release the right toe and lower the right leg to the floor.
sodasa: inhale, catch the left big toe with the left hand while keeping both legs straight.
saptadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
astadasa: inhale, lower the head to the floor.
ekonavimsatih: exhale, take the left leg to the left side, look to the right.
vimsatih: inhale, bring the left leg back to center.
eka vimsatih: exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
dva vimsatih: inhale, lower the head only.
trayo vimsatih: exhale, release the left toe and lower the left leg to the floor.
catur vimsatih: inhale, take the feet over the head and take cakrasana back into chaturanga dandasana.
panca vimsatih: inhale, push up to upward dog.
sat vimsatih: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated, lie down.
astau: inhale, bring both legs over the head, catch the big toes.
nava: inhale, roll up with straight legs and look up.
dasa: inhale, lift.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: inhale, bring both legs over the head, catch the heels.
nava: inhale, roll up with straight legs.
dasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
ekadasa: inhale, straighten the arms, head back, exhale.
dvadasa: inhale, lift.
trayodasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
caturdasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
pancadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: exhale, bend the knees slightly with the heels together, take back the head, and cross the arms over the chest.
nava: inhale, lift the hips off the floor.
dasa: exhale, come down.
ekadasa: inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana, roll back into chaturanga dandasana.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: exhale, bend the knees, take the hands back behind the shoulders.
nava: inhale, lift the body up off the floor.
dasa: exhale, come down to the floor. Repeat two to four more times.
ekadasa: inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana. roll back into chaturanga dandasana.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: jump through to seated and straighten the legs.
astau: inhale, lock the hands around the feet and lift the head up.
nava: exhale, touch the head or chin to the knees.
dasa: inhale, head up.
ekadasa: inhale, lift.
dvadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
trayodasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
caturdasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
astau: inhale, lift the legs straight up.
astau: exhale, lower the legs over the head and touch the toes to the floor.
astau: exhale, bend the knees around the head and press them to the ears.
nava: inhale, lift the legs up and take padmasana. Place the hands on the knees.
nava: inhale, wrap the arms around padmasana and lock the hands.
nava: exhale, lower padmasana to the floor, arch back, top of head on floor.
nava: exhale, straighten lift the legs and arms, and press the hands together.
dasa: inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana, roll back to chaturanga dandasana.
ekadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
dvadasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, take sirsasana position.
astau: inhale, lift the legs straight up.
nava: Exhale, lower the legs half way, point the toes.
dasa: Exhale, come down, sit on the heels with the head remaining down.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, exhale, push back to downward dog.
sapta: inhale, jump through to seated.
astau: inhale, take padmasana position, wrap the left arm and then the right around to bind.
nava: exhale, touch the chin to the floor.
dasa: inhale, come up. Straighten the arms and breathe deeply with sound.
dasa: inhale, lift up and balance.
ekadasa: exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
dvadasa: inhale, push up to upward dog.
trayodasa: exhale, push back to downward dog.
caturdasa: inhale, jump to standing.
pancadasa: exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
